data.text: (Bzzzzzz!)
data.processed: <story>(Bzzzzzz!)

data.text:
――I overslept! 
What a trainer I am.
data.processed:
<story>――I overslept! 
<story>What a trainer I am.

data.text:
I wouldn't be able to make it in time for the bell. 
But even then, I hurried to the school gate.
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't be able to make it in time for the bell. 
<story>But even then, I hurried to the school gate.

data.text:
You're... a trainer, right? 
Are you late?
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>You're... a trainer, right? 
<story>Are you late?

data.text:
In a position where you guide the Umamusume. 
That's not okay.
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>In a position where you guide the Umamusume. 
<story>That's not okay.

data.text:
I was suddenly scolded by a stranger. 
But...

choices.text: Why are you here at this time?

data.processed:
<story>I was suddenly scolded by a stranger. 
<story>But...

data.text:
I'm sorry, I'm actually late too. 
To be precise, I'm still a bit late.
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry, I'm actually late too. 
<story>To be precise, I'm still a bit late.

data.text:
There is a reason why I was late for school. 
What happened was...
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>There is a reason why I was late for school. 
<story>What happened was...

data.text:
What is this...!? To think that the zipper on my skirt 
would break while changing clothes...!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>What is this...!? To think that the zipper on my skirt 
<story>would break while changing clothes...!

data.text:
At this point, I have no choice but to tape it! 
If no one notices, there's no need to be embarrassed!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>At this point, I have no choice but to tape it! 
<story>If no one notices, there's no need to be embarrassed!

data.text: So right now, I'm holding my skirt together with tape.
data.name: Calstone Light O

choices.text: You don't have to say it...!

data.processed: <story>So right now, I'm holding my skirt together with tape.

data.text:
I thought she was a cool Umamusume, but she was a bit different. 
What is she all about?
data.processed:
<story>I thought she was a cool Umamusume, but she was a bit different. 
<story>What is she all about?

data.text:
As if she's saying everything that comes to mind... 
From things that are hard to say to things that shouldn't be said.
data.processed:
<story>As if she's saying everything that comes to mind... 
<story>From things that are hard to say to things that shouldn't be said.

data.text:
Huh!? More importantly, we have to hurry. 
There's still a way to avoid being late.
data.name: Calstone Light O

choices.text: W-Wait, that's impossible, even for a Umamusume...
choices.processed: <size=32>W-Wait, that's impossible, even for a Umamusume...</size>

data.processed:
<story>Huh!? More importantly, we have to hurry. 
<story>There's still a way to avoid being late.

data.text:
The speed at which a Umamusume runs is far faster 
than that of an ordinary person. However, considering 
the time left until the start of class...
data.processed:
<story>The speed at which a Umamusume runs is far faster 
<story>than that of an ordinary person. However, considering 
<story>the time left until the start of class...

data.text:
Normally, I wouldn't make in time. 
However, if the path from here to the classroom is "a straight line".
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>Normally, I wouldn't make in time. 
<story>However, if the path from here to the classroom is "a straight line".

data.text:
Yes. I consider there to be no curves. 
If I run along the shortest path, almost in a straight line――
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>Yes. I consider there to be no curves. 
<story>If I run along the shortest path, almost in a straight line――

data.text:
I'm sure to make it in time! 
Well, I'll go! Haaaa!!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>I'm sure to make it in time! 
<story>Well, I'll go! Haaaa!!

data.text:
Before I could stop her, that Umamusume ran off. 
And then――
data.processed:
<story>Before I could stop her, that Umamusume ran off. 
<story>And then――

data.text: Gaaaah! It hurts, it hurts!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed: <story>Gaaaah! It hurts, it hurts!

data.text:
As expected, she hit the statue of the three goddesses and 
hurt her body, and she was tumbling around in the courtyard.
data.processed:
<story>As expected, she hit the statue of the three goddesses and 
<story>hurt her body, and she was tumbling around in the courtyard.

data.text:
I've heard various things about the straight-shooting 
Umamusume "Calstone Light O".
data.processed:
<story>I've heard various things about the straight-shooting 
<story>Umamusume "Calstone Light O".

data.text:
Hey, Light O, I have something to talk to you about... 
Actually, I had a big fight with a friend.
data.name: Classmate Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Light O, I have something to talk to you about... 
<story>Actually, I had a big fight with a friend.

data.text:
I've been reflecting too. But it's hard to say I'm sorry, 
and I want to make up little by little.
data.name: Classmate Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>I've been reflecting too. But it's hard to say I'm sorry, 
<story>and I want to make up little by little.

data.text: Got it. I'll convey it indirectly.
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed: <story>Got it. I'll convey it indirectly.

data.text:
I have something to say. That girl wants to make up. 
But she says it's hard to say sorry.
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>I have something to say. That girl wants to make up. 
<story>But she says it's hard to say sorry.

data.text: D-Don't say everything~!
data.name: Classmate Umamusume
data.processed: <story>D-Don't say everything~!

data.text:
Hmm, basketball today. 
Run to the goal, Believe!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, basketball today. 
<story>Run to the goal, Believe!

data.text:
...Yes! 
Pass... here, Light O-san!
data.name: Believe
data.processed:
<story>...Yes! 
<story>Pass... here, Light O-san!

data.text: That's an option, but――
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed: <story>That's an option, but――

data.text:
Dribbling through! 
Taaaaaaa!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>Dribbling through! 
<story>Taaaaaaa!

data.text:
Ah.... she's running straight into the defense! 
Ahh...
data.name: Believe
data.processed:
<story>Ah.... she's running straight into the defense! 
<story>Ahh...

data.text:
Calstone Light O charged right into the center of the enemy's half, 
and quickly lost the ball.
data.processed:
<story>Calstone Light O charged right into the center of the enemy's half, 
<story>and quickly lost the ball.

data.text:
A double score... 
What a terrible way to lose...
data.name: Believe

choices.text: Hello, can I talk to you for a bit?

data.processed:
<story>A double score... 
<story>What a terrible way to lose...

data.text: Huh... a trainer?
data.name: Believe
data.processed: <story>Huh... a trainer?

data.text:
...I'm Believe. 
Um, what's up?
data.name: Believe
data.processed:
<story>...I'm Believe. 
<story>Um, what's up?

data.text:
Believe seems to be a careful, cautious type of sprinter. 
When I asked her about Calstone Light O again――
data.processed:
<story>Believe seems to be a careful, cautious type of sprinter. 
<story>When I asked her about Calstone Light O again――

data.text:
Yes... 
Light O is always straightforward and inflexible.
data.name: Believe
data.processed:
<story>Yes... 
<story>Light O is always straightforward and inflexible.

data.text:
Even in basketball or soccer, she dribbles in a straight line. 
So, they read her moves and gets countered...
data.name: Believe
data.processed:
<story>Even in basketball or soccer, she dribbles in a straight line. 
<story>So, they read her moves and gets countered...

data.text:
Although she looked sharp, Calstone Light O seemed to be 
a quite interesting Umamusume.
data.processed:
<story>Although she looked sharp, Calstone Light O seemed to be 
<story>a quite interesting Umamusume.

data.text: ――And one day, on the way home.
data.processed: <story>――And one day, on the way home.

data.text: Oyaa!! I'll take this!!
data.name: Snatch theft
data.processed: <story>Oyaa!! I'll take this!!

data.text:
I was robbed of my bag by a motorcycle that came up from behind! 
I can't believe I was mugged.
data.processed:
<story>I was robbed of my bag by a motorcycle that came up from behind! 
<story>I can't believe I was mugged.

data.text:
I tried to chase after them in a hurry, but the road was a complete straight line. 
There's no way I could catch up to them.
data.processed:
<story>I tried to chase after them in a hurry, but the road was a complete straight line. 
<story>There's no way I could catch up to them.

data.text: Just when I thought there was nothing I could do.
data.processed: <story>Just when I thought there was nothing I could do.

data.text:
Are you all right!? 
I'm here――!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>Are you all right!? 
<story>I'm here――!

data.text:
I will catch that mugger and make him pay. 
I will!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>I will catch that mugger and make him pay. 
<story>I will!

data.text:
Umamusume are overwhelmingly faster than humans. However, 
when it comes to motorcycles, the story is different. At that speed, 
there's no way she catches up...
data.processed:
<story>Umamusume are overwhelmingly faster than humans. However, 
<story>when it comes to motorcycles, the story is different. At that speed, 
<story>there's no way she catches up...

data.text: Haaaaaa!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed: <story>Haaaaaa!

data.text:
The acceleration is smooth. As expected of an Umamusume. 
But the problem starts here.
data.processed:
<story>The acceleration is smooth. As expected of an Umamusume. 
<story>But the problem starts here.

data.text:
There's no way she could reach a top speed to match a motorcycle's. 
At some point she'd hit the ceiling and be left behind...
data.processed:
<story>There's no way she could reach a top speed to match a motorcycle's. 
<story>At some point she'd hit the ceiling and be left behind...

data.text:
From here――! 
Oooohhhhh――!!
data.name: Calstone Light O
data.processed:
<story>From here――! 
<story>Oooohhhhh――!!

data.text:
I saw something unbelievable. 
That Umamusume――
data.processed:
<story>I saw something unbelievable. 
<story>That Umamusume――

data.text:
Calstone Light O became faster than the wind―― 
She exceeded the maximum speed an Umamusume could achieve, and――
data.processed:
<story>Calstone Light O became faster than the wind―― 
<story>She exceeded the maximum speed an Umamusume could achieve, and――

data.text: Wha- you idiot!?
data.name: Snatch theft
data.processed: <story>Wha- you idiot!?

data.text:
I saw the light. 
A single beam of light.
data.processed:
<story>I saw the light. 
<story>A single beam of light.

data.text:
That Umamusume――surpassing a motorcycle's top speed, 
stood in the way of the thief.
data.processed:
<story>That Umamusume――surpassing a motorcycle's top speed, 
<story>stood in the way of the thief.

title: Amazing speed! That Umamusume is like the light
